name: Entity Glossary (Lua)
description: Generate glossaries and relationship maps from project entities
author: VS Write Team

tools.name: entity_glossary
tools.description: Generate a formatted glossary of all entities in the project, grouped by type

entity_type.description: Filter by entity type (e.g., 'fact', 'rule', 'concept', 'relationship', 'event'). If not specified, includes all types.

tools.name: entity_relationships
tools.description: Show relationships between entities and the sections they appear in

entity_id.description: Specific entity ID to show relationships for. If not specified, shows all relationships.

include_sections.description: Include section appearances in the output. Defaults to true.
